hero.title: Ready to streamline your workflow?
hero.subtitle: Our AI-powered tool automatically extracts data from invoices, matches it with your inventory data, eliminating manual entry errors. Speed up your workflow today.
hero.cta_note: Free trial, no credit card required.

how_it_works.title: Get Started in Three Simple Steps
how_it_works.subtitle: Go from a paper document to analysis-ready data in under a minute.
how_it_works.step1_description: Upload your price list in CSV or Excel format so our AI can accurately match products.
how_it_works.step2_description: Take a photo or scan your invoices. You can upload multiple files at once.
how_it_works.step3_description: Review the extracted data, make edits if necessary, and export in a convenient format.

features.title: Everything You Need for Automation
features.subtitle: Our solution is designed to help you spend less time on routine tasks and more on growing your business.
features.feature1_description: Our technology recognizes and correctly structures data even from complex invoices.
features.feature2_description: Customize columns, change their order, and export data to CSV for integration with your systems.
features.feature3_description: Manage multiple companies and warehouses within a single account.

pricing.title: Transparent and Clear Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that's right for your business.

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: Ideal for small to medium businesses.

premium.name: Premium
premium.description: For large companies and high volumes.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Here you will find answers to the most popular questions.
faq.q1: How is the accuracy of data recognition ensured?
faq.a1: Our AI is trained on thousands of different invoices. It uses advanced algorithms to identify and extract data. You can also match products with your nomenclature for maximum accuracy.
faq.q2: What file formats can I upload?
faq.a2: You can upload files in JPG, PNG, and PDF formats. We recommend using high-resolution images for the best results.
faq.a3: Yes, we take data security very seriously. All data is transmitted over encrypted channels and stored in a secure cloud infrastructure.
faq.q4: What happens if I exceed the invoice limit in my plan?
faq.a4: The application will notify you when you reach the limit. You can upgrade to a higher plan to continue processing invoices without interruption.

cta_final.title: Ready to streamline your workflow?
cta_final.subtitle: Sign up now and process your first 50 invoices for free. Feel the difference from day one.

footer.about: Automate invoice processing with artificial intelligence. Save time, reduce errors, and focus on growing your business.
